import { LockClosedIcon } from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { useAuth } from '../hooks/useAuth' import { useState } from 'react' export default function Auth() { const [email, setEmail]=useState('') const [password, setPassword]=useState('') const {isAuth, setIsAuth}=useAuth('') const [error, setError]=useState('') const authHandler=async()=>{ if(email && password){ if(email !== 'row@232.ru'){ return setError('не верная почта') } if(password !== '12345'){ return setError('не верный пароль') } await localStorage.setItem('row@232.ru', '12345') setIsAuth(true) }else{ /* setError('Заполните все поля!') */ } } return ( <>
